an10.86:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma mahakassapo rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
an10.86:1.2: Tatra kho ayasma mahakassapo bhikkhu amantesi:
an10.86:1.4: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato mahakassapassa paccassosum.
an10.86:2.2: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati pajanami’ti.
an10.86:2.3: Tamenam tathagato va tathagatasavako va jhayi samapattikusalo paracittakusalo paracittapariyayakusalo samanuyunjati samanuggahati samanubhasati.
an10.86:2.4: So tathagatena va tathagatasavakena va jhayina samapattikusalena paracittakusalena paracittapariyayakusalena samanuyunjiyamano samanuggahiyamano samanubhasiyamano irinam apajjati vicinam apajjati anayam apajjati byasanam apajjati anayabyasanam apajjati.
an10.86:3.1: Tamenam tathagato va tathagatasavako va jhayi samapattikusalo paracittakusalo paracittapariyayakusalo evam cetasa ceto paricca manasi karoti:
an10.86:3.3: khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati pajanami’ti.
an10.86:4.1: Tamenam tathagato va tathagatasavako va jhayi samapattikusalo paracittakusalo paracittapariyayakusalo evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanati:
an10.86:5.1: ‘Adhimaniko kho ayamayasma adhimanasacco, appatte pattasanni, akate katasanni, anadhigate adhigatasanni.
an10.86:5.3: khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati pajanami’ti.
an10.86:6.1: Tamenam tathagato va tathagatasavako va jhayi samapattikusalo paracittakusalo paracittapariyayakusalo evam cetasa ceto paricca manasi karoti:
an10.86:6.2: ‘kim nu kho ayamayasma nissaya adhimaniko adhimanasacco, appatte pattasanni, akate katasanni, anadhigate adhigatasanni.
an10.86:6.4: khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati pajanami’ti.
an10.86:7.1: Tamenam tathagato va tathagatasavako va jhayi samapattikusalo paracittakusalo paracittapariyayakusalo evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanati:
an10.86:8.1: ‘Bahussuto kho pana ayamayasma sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhamma adikalyana majjhekalyana pariyosanakalyana sattham sabyanjanam kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam abhivadanti, tatharupassa dhamma bahussuta honti dhata vacasa paricita manasanupekkhita ditthiya suppatividdha.
an10.86:8.2: Tasma ayamayasma adhimaniko adhimanasacco, appatte pattasanni, akate katasanni, anadhigate adhigatasanni.
an10.86:8.4: khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati pajanami’ti.
an10.86:9.1: Tamenam tathagato va tathagatasavako va jhayi samapattikusalo paracittakusalo paracittapariyayakusalo evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanati:
an10.86:10.3: Abhijjhapariyutthanam kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.86:11.3: Byapadapariyutthanam kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.86:12.3: Thinamiddhapariyutthanam kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.86:13.3: Uddhaccapariyutthanam kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.86:14.3: Vicikicchapariyutthanam kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.86:15.1: Kammaramo kho pana ayamayasma kammarato kammaramatam anuyutto.
an10.86:15.2: Kammaramata kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.86:16.1: Bhassaramo kho pana ayamayasma bhassarato bhassaramatam anuyutto.
an10.86:16.2: Bhassaramata kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.86:17.1: Niddaramo kho pana ayamayasma niddarato niddaramatam anuyutto.
an10.86:17.2: Niddaramata kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.86:18.1: Sanganikaramo kho pana ayamayasma sanganikarato sanganikaramatam anuyutto.
an10.86:18.2: Sanganikaramata kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.86:19.1: Sati kho pana ayamayasma uttari karaniye oramattakena visesadhigamena antara vosanam apanno.
an10.86:19.2: Antara vosanagamanam kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam’.
an10.86:20.1: So vatavuso, bhikkhu ‘ime dasa dhamme appahaya imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjissati’ti netam thanam vijjati.
an10.86:20.2: So vatavuso, bhikkhu ‘ime dasa dhamme pahaya imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjissati’ti thanametam vijjati”ti.
